filmJson.name: Circle-Vision 360°
filmJson.fact1: This format was nine 35mm cameras and fit a projection screen that wrapped a full 360° around the cinema
filmJson.fact2: Disney had developed a precursor to this format called Circarama, which used eleven 16mm cameras to create a circle of vision
filmJson.fact3: This format premiered at Disneyland on July 17, 1955
